NewsArticle.Title: Reset Notes/Updates
NewsArticle.Content: Reset Notes/Updates -Skills/Spells Update * Increase Damage of Unholy Explosion -Item Update * Increased Damage of Single/Double/Triple Fire Arrows * Heavy Veltain Treasure Chest prize will include 50+ Million EXP Points -Mount Giragan * Increased EXP on all Monsters * Increased spawn on all Monsters * 99% of maps will now spawn Monsters -Shinewood Forest * Increased spawns on SW 36-43 -Balance Arena * Removing PVP option * Updated Mech AI
